seo.title: Home
seo.description: Your cargo specialist in Belgium. We are experts in import, export and live animal transport. Discover our company.

intro.title: Your goods, delivered with <0>expertise.</0>
intro.paragraph: For the expedition of your goods, there is only one address: Eagle Air Agencies. Your freight will arrive in the best condition thanks to our many years of mastering the business.

card.text1: Our import team takes care of your freight from A to Z.
card.text2: Worldwide shipment for your freight. No destination is too far.
card.text3: Live animals are transported in the best possible conditions.

stats.header: <0>Dock and load.</0><1/>Let the numbers convince you!
stats.text1: The total surface of our warehouse.
stats.text2: We export to more than 135 countries worldwide.
stats.text3: The amount of experience in our sector
stats.text4: That’s a lot of freightage we ship each year!

about.title: Why Eagle Air?
about.itemText1: As a family business, we are 24/7 available.
about.itemText2: Urgent shipment? We are immediately at your disposal.
about.itemText3: Our staff will take care of your cargo with the best knowledge and care.
about.itemText4: Experts in air freight since 1992 and top 5 IATA-CASS forwarder in Belgium.
